Your omni-tool's trophy system detects incoming explosives that fires a small ordinance charge to preemptively detonate hostile explosives. As a reaction to an explosive projectile (grenade or rocket from a heavy weapon) that you can see within of you, you may preemptively detonate it. If the blast would cause you to make a Dexterity saving throw, you have advantage on the save.

You may use this ability once per long rest.

name: Turbocharge

advancements.name: Improved Damage
advancements.text: +2 damage with the turbocharged weapon

advancements.name: Improved Accuracy
advancements.text: The DC of the Dexterity saving throw is increased to 18

html:
Activate a subroutine that temporarily vents weapon heat through your armor to improve thermal clip efficiency and weapon damage. Until the end of your turn, a ranged weapon you're holding gains Burst Fire, the heat cost for making a Burst Fire attack is reduced by 1 heat, and you may make a Burst Fire attack as an Attack action.

You must finish a short or long rest before using Turbocharge again.

name: Unity

advancements.name: Unrestricted (Engineer only)
advancements.text: Engineers can spend any amount of tech points to cast this power. They are not limited by their Tech Point Limit column.

advancements.name: Shield restore
advancements.text: Creatures also gain 1d4 shield points. This increases by 1d4 for each power slot above the 2nd.

html:
Spawn a swarm of healing nanobots that heal allies. Up to six organic creatures of your choice that you can see within range regain hit points equal to 1d6 + your powercasting ability modifier.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by 2d6 for each slot level above 2nd.

name: Vortex

advancements.name: Radial
advancements.text: You may cast the vortex in a <me-distance length='15' adj />-radius sphere centered on you instead.

advancements.name: Damage
advancements.text: Increase the damage to d12

html:
You intertwine negative and positive mass effect fields to create a swirling vortex. Creatures within a cone must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save a creature takes 6d10 force damage, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Creatures that fail the saving throw are thrown 1d6 + away from you and become prone.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 4th level or higher, increase the damage by 2d10 for each slot level above the 3rd.

name: Warp Cloud

advancements.name: Burst
advancements.text: As a bonus action, you can end this power and force each creature within <me-distance length="5" /> of the cloud to make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 4d4 force damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one. This damage increases by 4d4 force damage per power level.

advancements.name: Shift
advancements.text: As a bonus action, you can move this cube of warp energy up to <me-distance length="10" /> in any direction you choose. It can pass through solid objects, but you can only control it's movement while you have line of sight.

html:
Target a point within range, creating a highly-concentrated warp field in a cube. A creature takes 4d4 necrotic damage when it enters the power area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. A creature within the cloud is .

At Higher Levels. When you cast this power using a power slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 4d4 for each slot level above 1st.

name: Warp

advancements.name: Internal Bleeding
advancements.text: The shifting causes internal bleeding. At the start of each of your turns, the target suffers 1d6 damage from blood loss, bypassing its shields. This effect ends if the creature uses medi-gel or if it or another creature passes a DC 10 Wisdom (Medicine) check to stabilize the bleeding.

advancements.name: Disorient
advancements.text: A target hit by warp must pass a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the force of warp is so intense the target is stunned until the end of its next turn.

notes: Hit: CON save (DC {{ dc }}) or stunned

html:
Make a ranged power attack on an organic creature you can see within range. On a hit, you generate a rapidly shifting mass effect field inside the target dealing 3d10 necrotic damage. In addition, the target is until the end of your next turn. This damage bypasses shields.

At Higher Levels: When you cast this power using a power slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by 2d10 for each slot level above the 2nd.
